name: Bliss (itch) (Nicky Du, CECIL, Alextianyouwang)
description:
Bliss is a first-person experimental adventure game about nostalgia and childhood memories in a Windows XP fantasy world.  The player turns on an old PC to retrieve important files before throwing it out.

The game is still in development. You can download the pre-alpha demo (11/22/2022) below. 

(Note: This is not an alpha playtest. Little content is involved. little Indication is provided to see if the controls are intuitive enough. ) Answering these questions after playing the demo is very appreciated: https://forms.gle/uv75fYLSCqyz1PCp8

Steam early access will open on 1/1/2023. Thank you for your patience! :)
